thread.title: Tip-Top shape at the Marmara Hotel
thread.title_full: Tip-Top shape at the Marmara Hotel - Review of The Marmara Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: dennisbotzer
title: Tip-Top shape at the Marmara Hotel
text:
Wonderful stay at the Marmara Hotel on 94th Street. Super comfortable bed, great shower, everything in tip-top shape ! The staff is very friendly and accommodating. The room had a fully stocked kitchen ... fridge, stove, sink, pots & pans, eating utensils for four people. Beautiful place !! Will definitely recommend to friends.
Room Tip: The higher the floor, the less noise from traffic ... but that's always the case in NYC. See more room tips
